help-file.title: FEEDING
help-file.content: On Duris, artifacts, uniques, and iouns are in need of "feeding", which means killing someone of the opposite racewar in order to gain a full frag. You must reach one full frag to sate your artifact within a number of days which varies between each item. If you fail to feed, your artifact will be removed and placed back into the game where it loads, if any.
